resources.string: The G in (G)I-DLE is a short for Girl. I means I as in myself, and DLE (ë“¤) is a Korean compound word used to form plurals. (G)I-DLE is a global quintet who construct their own musical universe with their exceptional concepts and songwriting skills.(G)I-DLE is a global quintet who construct their own musical universe with their exceptional concepts and songwriting skills. The six members of the group are MIYEON, MINNIE, SOOJIN, SOYEON, YUQI, and SHUHUA.
